Jinnō Shōtōki. p. 233-237. == Events of the Kenji era == * 1275 (Kenji 1): The Mongols sent an ambassador to Kamakura along with the delegation sent from the Goryeo.Titsingh, pp. 258-259. ==Related pages == * Kamakura period == References == == Other websites == * National Diet Library, "The Japanese Calendar" Kenji 1st 2nd 3rd 4th 1275 1276 1277 1278 Preceded by: Bun'ei Era or nengō: Kenji Succeeded by: Kōan Category:Japanese eras Category:1270s in Japan
title: Kenji (era)
